definition[0]: one of the areas that a town or city is divided into, so that elections or police work can be organized more easily
definition[1]: the main police station in a particular area of a town or city
definition[2]: an area of a city with many different shops, where cars are not allowed
example[0]: The hotel is within five minutes of the main shopping precinct.
definition[3]: an area in a city with its own local government, police force etc
